core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Hosting reliability with SaaS speed aesthetics.
Emotion First: Trust (White/Blue) for Marketing, Focus (Dark/Slate) for Dashboard.
RTL First: Every component must be designed for Arabic reading flow (Right-to-Left).
Content is King: Typography (Cairo) leads the design.

usage.numbers_and_code: Inter or JetBrains Mono - For pricing, IPs, and server stats.

rtl_rules: CRITICAL: Add 'dir=rtl' to the root HTML tag.
Use logical properties: 'ms-' (margin-start) instead of 'ml-', 'me-' (margin-end) instead of 'mr-'.
Icons: Flip directional icons (arrows, chevrons) using 'rtl:rotate-180'.
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for sections. Gap-8 for grids.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Features, High Density (Mode B) for Dashboard.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/20
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-11 px-8 rounded-md font-medium

cards.marketing: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shadow-none

inputs.style: h-11 rounded-md border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 text-right

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 border border-white/20 shadow-sm (Use for sticky navs)
visual_enhancers.grid_borders: Use 'border-collapse' logic for dashboard stats to look technical.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use subtle blue glows behind hero images or key pricing cards.

hero_bg.alt: Modern Data Center with Blue Neon Lights
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or side visual with overlay.

support_agent.usage: Contact Us page or '24/7 Support' section.

home: Why Choose Us (Bento Grid of features)

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SET RTL: Ensure the <html> tag has dir='rtl' and lang='ar'.
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update font-family to use 'Cairo' as default sans.
4. SHADCN: Customize components to match the 'Electric Blue' and 'Slate' palette.
5. ICONS: Use Lucide-react. Remember to flip directional icons for RTL.
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for smooth entrance effects (fade-up, slide-in).
7. MOCK DATA: Create realistic Arabic mock data for plans (e.g., 'استضافة مشتركة', 'سيرفرات خاصة').
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
